name: dDNS-ng
tagline: dynamic DNS client/server with MySQL support
body:
### About
![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3996605/dDNS-ng.png)If you are tired searching another free dynamic DNS Service or none of available subdomains doesn't fits you and you are desperate to run your own service, here it is! dDNS-ng solution.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
